title: Windowed Client on MAC
body: Hey, I'm trying to make my league client windowed mode so I can play and do work on dual monitors but when I changed to windowed mode the mouse pointer refuses to leave the game screen no matter. Is there a possible way I can achieve this? Thanks

replies.body: There may be a setting disabling the cursor from going off screen, but our [mouse issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#section-mac) guide may be able to help.  If the issue persists hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our more mac specialized tech team can help.  Hang tight!
